title: KDP Niches I Wish I Knew Sooner Are Way More Profitable Than I Expected
description:

KDP niches I wish I knew sooner are turning out to be way more profitable than I ever expected. In this video, I reveal several coloring book sub-niches on Amazon that are just starting to gain traction and could explode in sales if you position yourself now. I’ll walk you through what makes these niches powerful, how to research competition, and why jumping in early can turn a simple book into a consistent bestseller.
